Emacs commands

### General ###

Open this document: C-c m
Terminate command: C-g
Create new buffer/Switch between buffers: C-x b
Show list of buffers: C-x C-b
Kill buffer: C-x k
Open file: C-x C-f
Save file: C-x C-s
Run command: M-x
Switch between windows: C-x o
Delete all windows except the current one (not losing data): C-x 1
Split frame above and bellow: C-x 2
Split frame side by side: C-x 3
Delete current window: C-x 0
Exit emacs: C-x C-c

### Text editing ###

Kill line: C-k
Undo: C-/
Move to beginning of line: C-a
Move to end of line: C-e
Move forward one charachter: C-f
Move backward one charachter: C-b
Move forward one word: M-f
Move backward one word: M-b
Regex search: C-s
Regex search in reverse: C-r
Search: C-M-s
Search in reverse: C-M-r
Go to line: M-g g

### Region handling ###

Mark start of the region: C-SPC
Kill region: C-w
Copy region to kill ring:: M-w
Yank: C-y
Cycle though kill ring after yanking: M-y
Kill word: M-d
Kill line: C-k
Select whole region: C-x h

### Clojure/Cider ###

Start Clojure REPL: C-c M-j
Start ClojureScript REPL: C-c M-J
Eval last command: C-x C-e
Eval and print: C-u C-x C-e
Load file in REPL: C-c M-n
Compile file to REPL: C-c C-k
Close paranthesis: C-RET
Open doc: C-c C-d C-d
Open src: M-.
Return to buffer: M-,
Search text across code: C-c C-d C-a
Reident selected region: C-M-\
Whitespace cleanup: C-M ]
Switch to user ns: C-c u

### Paredit ###

Go to open paran: C-M-b
Go to closing paran: C-M-f

### Avy ###

Go to one char: C-=
Go to two chars: C-|
Go to line: M-g f
Go to word starting with char: M-g w
Go to all words: M-g e

### Org ###

Open agenda: C-c a
Mark task as done: C-c C-t
Insert heading: C-SHIFT-RET
Collapse/expand headings: SHIFT-TAB
Schedule task: C-c C-s

### Neotree ###

Show tree: F8
